bibl.title: New Documents Illustrating Early Christianity. 8. A Review of the Greek Inscriptions and Papyri published in 1984-85.
bibl.note: Some notable entries: The Government's Pursuit of Runaway Slaves. - Taxes on Donkeys in Roman Egypt. - Imperial Rescripts. - The Christian Symbol ΧΜΓ.
bibl.seg: LLEWELYN S.R., New Documents Illustrating Early Christianity. 8. A Review of the Greek Inscriptions and Papyri published in 1984-85.

North Ryde, Austr., Macquarie University, The Ancient History Documentary Research Centre - Grand Rapids, Michigan - Cambridge, U.K., W.B. Eerdmans, 1998, 8°, [viii]-198 pp., tabl. ISBN 0-8028-4518-5.
Some notable entries: The Government's Pursuit of Runaway Slaves. - Taxes on Donkeys in Roman Egypt. - Imperial Rescripts. - The Christian Symbol ΧΜΓ.

C.R. par Laura Boffo, Biblica 81 (2000) pp. 137-141. - G.R. Brower, JECS 7 (1999) pp. 318-319. - J.K. Elliott, NT 41 (1999) pp. 207-208. - David Noy, CR N.S., 49 (1999) pp. 538-539. - D.S. Potter, BMCRev < http://ccat.sas.upenn.edu/bmcr/1999/1999-05-05.html >. - Peter van Minnen, BASP 36 (1999) pp. 169-176.
